test / Throws

Throws

class Throws

This annotation indicates what exceptions should be declared by a function when compiled to a JVM method.

Example:

Throws(IOException::class)
fun readFile(name: String): String {...}

class ItDoesSomeObfuscatedThing

Check output of

++++++++++[>+++++++>++++++++++>+++>+<<<<-]>++.>+.+++++++..+++.>++.<<+++++++++++++++.>.+++.------.--------.>+.>.
